title: PUBLISHERS WEEKLY Bestsellers
text:
The Canadian Press - ONLINE EDITION PUBLISHERS WEEKLY Bestsellers 
Copyright 5/8/2015 Publishers Weekly. Week ending 10/4/2015, powered by Nielsen Bookscan 5/8/2015 The Nielsen Company. 
HARDCOVER FICTION 
1. "The Murder House" by James Patterson and David Ellis (Little, Brown) 
2. "The Girl in the Spider's Web" by David Lagercrantz (Knopf) 
3. "Come Rain or Come Shine" by Jan Karon (G.P. Putnam's Sons) 
4. "After You" by Jojo Moyes (Pamela Dorman Books) 
5. "Make Me" by Lee Child (Delacorte Press 
6. "Go Set a Watchman" by Harper Lee (HarperCollins) 
7. "The Cinder Spires: The Aeronaut's Windlass" by Jim Butcher (Roc) 
8. "The Girl on the Train" by Paula Hawkins (Riverhead) 
9. "Pretty Girls" by Karin Slaughter (William Morrow) 
10. "X'' by Sue Grafton (Marion Wood Books/Putnam) 
11. "Devoted in Death" by J.D. Robb (Putnam) 
12. "Undercover" by Danielle Steel (Delacorte Press) 
13. "Shadow Play" by Iris Johansen (St. Martin's Press) 
14. "Purity" by Jonathan Franzen (Farrar Straus Giroux) 
15. "Fates and Furies" by Lauren Groff (Riverhead) 
HARDCOVER NONFICTION 
1. "Killing Reagan" by Bill O'Reilly (Holt) 
2. "The Life-Changing Magic of Tidying Up" by Marie Kondo (Ten Speed) 
3. "Big Magic" by Elizabeth Gilbert (Riverhead) 
4. "Live Love Lead" by Brian Houston (Hachette/Faith/Words) 
5. "Why Not Me?" by Mindy Kaling (Crown Archetype) 
6. "Is This Together" by Ann Romney (St. Martin's Press/Dunne) 
7. "The 20/20 Diet" by Phil McGraw (Bird Street Books) 
8. "Furiously Happy" by Jenny Lawson (Flatiron Books) 
9. "Between the World and Me" by Ta-Nehisi Coates (Spiegel & Grau) 
10. "Rising Strong" by Brene Brown (Spiegel & Grau) 
11. "Guinness World Records 2016" by Guiness World Records 
12. "Frankie Avalon's Italian Family Cookbook" by Frankie Avalon (St. Martin's Griffin) 
13. "Where I Am" by Billy Graham (Thomas Nelson) 
14. "It's Your Move" by Josh Altman (HarperOne) 
15. "The Whole 30" by Hartwig/Hartwig (HMH) 
MASS MARKET PAPERBACKS 
1. "Willow Brook Road" by Sherryl Woods (Harlequin, MIRA) 
2. "The Martian" (movie tie-in) by Andy Weir (Broadway) 
3. "Gray Mountain" by John Grisham (Dell) 
4. "Cold Cold Heart" by Tami Hoag (Signet) 
5. "Double Down: The Men Of The Sisterhood ?1" by Fern Michaels (Zebra) 
6. "Evergreen Springs" by RaeAnne Thayne (Harlequin HQN) 
7. "The Hidden" by Heather Graham (Harlequin, MIRA) 
8. "About a Vampire" by Lynsay Sands (Avon) 
9. "Trading Christmas" by Debbie Macomber (Mira) 
10. "Down the Rabbit Hole" by J.D. Robb, Mary Blaney, Elaine Fox, Mary Kay McComas and R.C. Ryan (Jove) 
11. "Hope to Die" by James Patterson (Hachette/Vision) 
12. "Smoke Jensen, the Beginning" by William W. Johnstone (Pinnacle) 
13. "Long, Tall Christmas" by Janet Dailey (Kensington/Zebra) 
14. "Brotherhood of Evil" by William W. Johnstone (Pinnacle) 
15. "The Escape" by David Baldacci (Hachette/Vision) 
TRADE PAPERBACKS 
1. "The Martian" by Andy Weir (Broadway) 
2. "Memory Man" by David Baldacci (Grand Central Life & Style)
